title: Bug 49235 - ServletContainerInitializer onStartup(Set<Class<? classSet is not expected class
description: Bug 49235: In the ServletContainerInitializer's onStartup method, the output is "MySomeClass" instead of the expected output "MySomeAnn".
OB: The output of the onStartup method in the ServletContainerInitializer class is "MySomeClass".
EB: The expected output of the onStartup method in the ServletContainerInitializer class should be "MySomeAnn".
